Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Shadow Temple Huge Pit)

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Epona's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Why won't anyone acknowledge the housing crisis in Kakariko Village?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Gerudo Training Ground#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Water)

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Small Key# and #a Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Ice Cavern# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Hylian Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Epona's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Magic Meter#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bow#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: Did you know that you can have complete control over the item placement, item pool, and more, using Plandomizer?

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #6# major items.

1.Hideout 2 Torch Jail In Cell Pot 4: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Light Trial)

2.Market Bombchu Bowling First Prize: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)
